item.title: Delta CEO: Airlines trying to 'copy us' as flyers embrace upscale seat options
item.description: Executives at American Airlines and Delta Air Lines see big payoffs from their premium investments in 2026.

item.title: Want World Cup 2026 tickets? These Bank of America cards can help you score them
item.description: Bank of America is offering select new cardholders exclusive access to buy World Cup 2026 tickets. Learn how the promo works and which card is best fo...

item.title: Royal Air Maroc adds flights to LAX in time for the World Cup
item.description: Royal Air Maroc will begin flying between Casablanca and Los Angeles three times per week in June, just as the World Cup kicks off.

item.title: TAP Air Portugal unveils a 'neighbor-free seat' booking option in economy
item.description: This new experience will bridge the gap between the economy cabin and the business-class experience.

item.title: How my Hilton cards turned a luxury Portugal resort stay into an all-inclusiveÂ experience
item.description: There are a handful of credit cards that offer Hilton statement credits. Here's how I used them to eliminate trip costs completely.
